channel.title: Building pi
channel.description:
hi i was planning on making a game and i need it so players can make walls or maybe drop something that is in there inventory please help i will give you credit thank you
ps when the "wall" is placed or builtit needs to be solid so noone can walk through it but maybe can destroy it
